SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.view.tui

Class Tui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.view.tui.Tui
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Tui extends Object implements View
This class is used to represent the Text User Interface (TUI) of the game. It implements the View interface and is used to display the game state and handle the user input.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is used to start the TUI. It clears the terminal and starts a new thread to read the user input. It also prints the initial stage of the game (where a players decides to join/create/rejoin a game).
      Specified by:
      run in interface View
